title: Kicked from queue by an other player (HACK???)
body:
I was on queue (ranked mode) and there is this player that seems that was autofilled to support and started saying that he is not going to support, so i started typing that he can always dodge and al the sudden I was kicked out of the queue lost LP point (normal as when you dodge a ranked game) and gotta wait (also normal as when dodging).
All to say that i didn't want to dodge the game and i believe that i was kicked out the game by an other player.
Can someone look into it please?

I don't know if a hack in the last patch, or just is a hack that someone developed.

replies.body: I haven't heard of anything that can do this, it sounds like a frustrating coincidence though.  :(  Are you on wifi?  You may have disconnected, let me know if it happens again though you may want to test it in a custom for a bit first.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=03Egedb3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-03T22:46:10.971+0000)
>
> I haven't heard of anything that can do this, it sounds like a frustrating coincidence though.  :(  Are you on wifi?  You may have disconnected, let me know if it happens again though you may want to test it in a custom for a bit first.

No i was really thrown out into the HOME client windows.
It is the weirds thing ever happen to me.
I have been playing for 4 years and is the first time.

In 4 years this is my second report about something, when actually happen because internet went down I can't really report it or make a complaint.
